Preparation for Additional Content
Bug Fixes

・Addition of a button to hide dialogues during Duels and to enable players to see Cards on the field.
・Changes to the chain button for better clarity.

Preparations for events
Preparations for new features

Issues to be fixed:
"Amazoness Trainee" Effect Fixed
The app crashes if the player is Auto-Dueling with the Spell Card "Last Chapter of the Noble Knights" in hand or on the field, or if the opponent NPC has "Last Chapter of the Noble Knights" in hand or on the field.
We will continue to add new content and work out balancing issues to improve player experience.

Skill Rebalancing Changes
The changes made to Skill effects will be applied when updating to Ver. 2.8.0. However, please note that the Skill descriptions will not be updated with this version update.

・Addition of a button to hide dialogues during Duels and to enable players to see Cards on the field.
・Changes to the chain button for better clarity.

Bug Fixes
Bug Fixes

Change to Cards Resolving without a Proper Target
When your card does not have a proper target when resolving, the game will no longer check your hand or Deck.
Cards with effects that include checking your hand or Deck will still function the same as before.

Preparations for events
Preparations for new features
Bug Fix(es)
Issue with "Vendread Nightmare" when Auto-Dueling

Bug Fix(es)

Details
Issue that occurs after hand shuffle animation

In order to ensure better security, the minimum version requirement for iOS devices will be updated as follows.
iOS 9 or later
We apologize for the inconvenience, and advise players using iOS devices to check their versions and update them if necessary.

Skill Rebalancing Changes
The changes made to Skill effects will be applied when updating to Ver. 3.1.0. However, please note that the Skill descriptions will not be updated with this version update.

Updated contents (applied after update)
・The ability to change speed of replays.
・"Titan Showdown" now has a visual effect when activating.
・Regarding the activation timing for "My Body as a Shield."

Issues to be fixed:
・There is an issue that prevents the Skill "Grit" from activating if your Draw Phase was skipped.
・There is an issue that prevents card effects that activate when a Trap Card is activated (such as "Magician of Dark Illusion"), if the Skill "Endless Trap Hell" is used.
Issue with the Effect of "Necrovalley"

Preparations for events
Preparations for new features
Bug Fix(es)

Details
An issue occurring with certain devices that information and UI on the upper part of the screen gets hidden which makes players difficult to play the game.

Change to Cards Resolving without a Proper Target
When your card does not have a proper target when resolving, the game will no longer check your hand or Deck.
Cards with effects that include checking your hand or Deck will still function the same as before.

Preparations for events
Preparations for new features
Bug Fix(es)
Issue with "Vendread Nightmare" when Auto-Dueling

Checking Skill details via Duel Log
Preparations for events
Preparations for new features

Preparations for events
Preparations for new features
Bug Fix(es)
　Issue with the Skill “ATK: 8800 Pulse“
　Issue with the Skill “ATK: 8800 Pulse“
　Issue with the effect of “Yosenju Oyam”

Preparations for events

Feature Added
・Checking the list during your opponent's turn

Feature Improvement
・Addition of the Card List's Sorting Feature

Bug Fix(es)
・About the Effect of "Bending Destiny" After Ver. 4.2.0 Update
　The issue has been fixed, and Spell/Trap Cards banished by the effect of "Bending Destiny" will now return to its owner’s hand at the end of the turn.

Bug Fix(es)

Details
　1. The Global Chat does not function correctly.
　2. The icon that indicates that a card has been targeted by a card effect disappears.
　3. The game screen becomes off-centered.
　4. When spectating a Duel in a Duel Room or viewing a replay, players are able to view the Extra Deck of the player at the bottom of the screen by holding down on it.

Preparations for events

Feature Improvement
　・When selecting an attack target with the effect of "Patrician of Darkness," you can now select a direct attack with monsters that can attack directly.


Bug Fix(es)

Bug Fix(es)

Details
　・When players open the Global Chat, or move chat rooms, the chat log scrolls to the oldest post.

New Display Feature: A “sword” icon during a Duel
　･During a Duel, a sword icon will be displayed on the attacking monster.

Feature Improvement
　・Due to ruling changes in the OCG, the rulings for "Machina Peacekeeper" "Sword Master" and "Forbidden Arts of the Gishki" will change.

Bug Fix(es)
　・The turn count for "Gjallarhorn" has been fixed and will now increase.
　・The tails effect for "Tour of Doom" has been fixed, and the effect will now last until the end of your turn.
　・When you banish cards from your hand with the effects of "Cybernetic Overflow" and "Fortune Lady Past" they are now treated as being banished by your card's effect.
　・Issue when going to and from the Duel Room

Preparations for events
Preparations for new features

Feature Improvement
・Improvements to the Card Status Icons
・Addition of Tabs in the Settings menu

Bug Fix(es)
・If the Skill "Life Cost 0" is active, "Prideful Roar" can now be used without paying Life Points.

Preparations for events
Preparations for new features

Preparations for events

Preparations for new features

Bug Fix(es)
・The following issue has been fixed: When "PSY-Framelord Zeta" uses its effect to banish itself and an opponent's monster, your opponent's monster did not return to the field in your turn following the turn the effect is activated, if "PSY-Framelord Zeta" is not banished.
・The following issue has been fixed: You will now be able to activate cards such as "Spell of Pain" and "Destiny HERO - Decider," even if you fail to destroy a monster with the effect of "Sun Dragon Inti" and "Golden Castle of Stromberg."
・The following issue has been fixed: If the first attack of "Splendid Rose" is negated, it will now be unable to make a second attack.
・The following issue has been fixed: "Reverse of Neos" can now activate if the card destroyed was called "Neos" when it was on the field, even if its original name is different.
・The following issue has been fixed: When a monster with effects that can be activated when it is flipped (such as "Madolche Marmalmaide" and "Flip Flop Frog") has flipped several times within the same Chain, players were able to activate its effect the number of times it was flipped.

Improvements to the Deck Icon in Duel World
Preparations for events
Preparations for new features

Bug Fix(es)
･The following issue has been fixed: When using the effect of "Bark of Dark Ruler" "Psychic Commander," or "Attack of the Cornered Rat" against a monster with ATK/DEF that is not a multiple of 100, players were not able to pay the minimum amount of Life Points exceeding that number.
･The following issue has been fixed: If Counters placed on "Gouki Cage Match" were removed during your opponent’s Battle Phase, you were unable to activate its effect to Special Summon "Gouki" monsters.
･The following issue has been fixed: When the effect of your opponent's "Aromage Rosemary" is about to be applied, the card's activation dialog does not appear at the beginning of the Battle Phase.
･The following issue has been fixed: If you Synchro Summon a monster using "Tatsunecro" and a monster in your hand while your opponent controls "Chaos Hunter," monsters in your hand will be banished.

[Updated contents (applied after update)]
Bug Fix(es)
･When the application version is updated to 4.8.0, the volume related settings at application startup are changed to the initial values.

･When using cards such as "Miracle Fusion" and you are about to select which Fusion ・・materials to use, you can now go back to the screen where you select which Fusion Monster to Summon.
･Cards that are treated as monsters due to their own effects such "Paleozoic" Trap Cards will now also be treated as monsters even if they are in face-down Defense Position.

Preparations for events
Preparations for new features

Bug Fix(es)
･When face-down "Amaterasu" and "Deus X-Krawler" have activated their effects, Duels will now progress correctly.
･The following issue has been fixed: If "Powersink Stone" with 0 or 1 Counters was on the field and you played a monster that is unaffected by Trap effects, the monster's effects were negated when 2 Counters were placed on "Powersink Stone".
･The following issue has been fixed: When using the effect of "Aromaseraphy Angelica" or "Aromage Laurel" that can be activated when you have more Life Points than your opponent can also be activated even if you and your opponent has same amount of Life Points.
･The following issue has been fixed: If you activate "Chain Hole" while you or your opponent controls "Chaos Hunter," you cannot use the effect to "banish 1 random card from either player's hand."

Improvements to the Deck Editor
Preparations for events
Preparations for new features

Bug Fix(es)
･Issue that Skill Tickets cannot be used correctly
･Following issue has been fixed: Incorrect card text and effect resolution of "Infernity Doom Slinger."
･Following issue has been fixed: The effect to "banish opponent’s cards from their Graveyard" was not applied if you have "Chaos Hunter" on your field.
･When "Witchcrafter Genni"'s effect to "banish this card and 1 "Witchcrafter" Spell from your Graveyard; this effect becomes that Spell’s effect when that card is activated" is activated, the effect will now be treated as a monster effect.
･Even if your opponent only controls monsters that cannot be selected as an attack target, you can now attack if they control a monster equipped with "Ring of Magnetism."

Improvements to the Character Selection Screen
Improvements to the Deck Editor Screen
Improvements to the Information Page

Preparations for events
Preparations for new features

Bug Fix(es)
･The following issue has been fixed: "The Weather" monsters are no longer able to activate effects gained from "The Weather" Spell/Trap Cards before they are successfully Summoned.
･If a Trap Card that is treated as a monster is banished to activate the effect of "World Legacy Clash," the ATK/DEF of the targeted monster will now be decreased.
･The effect of "Malefic Truth Dragon" to Special Summon itself from the Graveyard will now be negated by "Necrovalley."
･The following issue has been fixed: When a monster which has an effect to do multiple attacks (such as "Invoked Purgatrio"), does a second or subsequent attack and a replay of a battle occurs, the monster can still attack even it attacks a monster which negates its effects (such as "Samurai Destroyer").

Feature Added to the iPad Version
･Option to change the screen orientation has been added

Preparations for events
Preparations for new features
Bug Fix(es)
･The following issue has been fixed: When a "Morphtronic" monster is selected as the target of "Super Rush Recklessly"'s effect to return it to the Deck, players were able to activate "Morphtronic Forcefield."

[Updated contents (applied after update)]
Bug Fix(es)
･The screen changes to vertical mode even players set the screen orientation to "horizontal." (iPad)
・The on-screen keyboard does not appear when players play the game in horizontal mode. (iPad)
・The app sometimes crashes in certain condition

When Special Summoning cards such as "D.D. Sprite" and "Dragunity Arma Leyvaten" by the way that is specified in their card text, players will be able to cancel their action.

Preparations for events
Preparations for new features
Bug Fix(es)
･The following issue has been fixed: If the effect of your opponent's "Vola-Chemicritter Methydraco" is applied, you cannot target face-down Gemini monsters your opponent controls.
･The following issue has been fixed: When equipping "Phalanx Pike" to a monster that is treated as another monster (which is written on the card text) while on the field or in the Graveyard, the effect will not be applied correctly if the monster written on the card text does not exist in the Duel.
･The following issue has been fixed: While the control of "Samurai Destroyer" is changed, its effect can be activated after it is banished temporarily by an opponent's effect.
･The following issue has been fixed: If a player activates "Summon Breaker" after successfully Summoning 3 monsters, the effect will also activate when the other player Summons a monster.
･The following issue has been fixed: "The Weather" monsters can use the effect gained from "The Weather XX Canvas" cards when a monster is Normal Summoned.
･The following issue has been fixed: "Kachi Kochi Dragon" that has made a second attack with its effect can do another attack.
･The following issue has been fixed: When using "Fake Feather" and "Particle Fusion," the effect to target a card in the Graveyard is negated by the effect of "Necrovalley."

[Updated contents (applied after update)]
Bug Fix(es)
･Players cannot set up the data transfer settings
・Players cannot open the link of the shared replays
・Players cannot open the link of the shared Decks

･When a card activates an effect which it has gained from another card's effect, both of the cards will now be shown on the window.
・Improvements to the Gems purchase button.

Preparations for events
Preparations for new features
Bug Fix(es)
･The following issue has been fixed: If a target monster is under "cannot be targeted by effect" when the effect of cards such as "Galaxy-Eyes Photon Dragon" and "PSY-Framelord Zeta" are activated, the effect is not applied correctly.

･Improvement to the Duel Screen
･When the effect of cards such as "Rain Storm" and "Gogogo Golem - Golden Form" are used during "Reverse Trap" is activated, their ATK will be increased but other effects will not be applied to them.
･When you control a monster that equips "White Veil" the card's activation dialog will now appear at the beginning of the Battle Phase.

Preparations for events
Preparations for new features
Bug Fix(es)
･The effect of "Ancient Lamp" can be now activated even when it is turned to face-down Defense Position with "Book of Moon" after it is selected as an attack target.
･When a monster that is used to Special Summon "D.D. Sprite" returns to your field, the information on how it was Summoned will be now displayed.
･The issue that "Ultimate Providence" can be activated even when "Goblin of Greed" is on the field has been fixed.
･When the controller of cards such as "D.D. Warrior" is changed to your opponent, a monster will be now banished by their effect correctly.

･Improvement to the Duel Screen
･Updated: When a card such as "Neo-Spacian Dark Panther" activates a Continuous Effect gained from another card, both of the cards are shown on the window.
･Updated: If the effect of "Galaxy-Eyes Photon Dragon" is certain to be negated when it is activated, players can now only activate its effect three times during that battle.

Preparations for events
Preparations for new features
Bug Fix(es)
･Issue fixed: The screen will now proceed when you tap/click the "OK" button on the "Mission Circuit" Result screen.
･Issue fixed: When an Xyz Monster with Xyz Material(s) is destroyed by the Skill "Black Rose Gale," the Xyz Materials will now be sent to the Graveyard.
･Issue fixed: When you have a monster (such as "Tomato King") whose ATK are changed with its own effect, its ATK will increase correctly if you use the Skill "Ready For Victory."
･The following issue has been fixed: When activating "Wolf in Sheep's Clothing," the game becomes unplayable if you reveal monsters such as "Blue Duston."
･The following issue has been fixed: When "Trickstar Lilybell" is returned to your hand after being banished with "Snapdragon" until the End Phase, the effect of "Trickstar Lilybell" cannot be used.

Updated contents (applied after update)
･The following has been changed: The prompt to activate the effect of "Cyber Slash Harpie Lady" will now automatically appear in response to the activation of your own cards as well.

Preparations for events
Preparations for new features
Bug Fix(es)
･Issue fixed: When a Special Summoned monster becomes a monster that can be Normal Summoned due to a Skill, the monster will now be treated as a monster that was Special Summoned only.

[Updated contents (applied after update)]
Bug Fix(es)
･On a screen where players are suppose to select a single item from multiple choices, players are able to select multiple items from the list.

･A button to switch between "Owned Cards" and "All Cards" has been added to the filtering feature of the Deck Editor.
･When players return a card that is selected as a cost or selected when an effect is about to be resolved, an animation to display the card will be added.

Preparations for events
Preparations for new features
Bug Fix(es)
･When Auto-Dueling in NPC Duels, sometimes the effect of the following cards does not activate correctly.
「Kachi Kochi Dragon」
「Koa'ki Meiru Bergzak」

Updated contents (applied after update)
・Show/hide player name feature during PvP Duels

Preparations for events
Preparations for new features
Bug Fix(es)

Updated contents (applied after update)
･Ability to search cards by multiple terms with the same meaning.

Preparations for events
Preparations for new features
Bug Fix(es)

Updated contents (applied after update)
･Improvements to Loaner Deck Duels Screen

Preparations for events
Preparations for new features
Bug Fix(es)

Preparations for events
Preparations for new features
Bug Fix(es)

Updated contents (applied after update)
･Updates: The visibility of the Skill activation confirmation message

Preparations for events
Preparations for new features
Bug Fix(es)
･When you start Auto-Dueling with a Skill set to your Deck with an effect adding Pendulum Zones at the beginning of the Duel, the number of cards in the Deck/Extra Deck may temporarily be displayed in the center of the screen instead of on top of the cards, immediately after starting the Duel.

[Updated contents (applied after update)]
Bug Fix(es)
